title: Pixel support team... a total fail
content:
Unfortunately I have a pixel 2 xl phone..
5 months ago the usb c port stopped to functioning.
Since.. I took contact with google support team (i think they don't really exist .. Just AI behind the keyboard) and claim for a warranty..
diagnostics.. photos.. videos etc. etc. and they told me "ok your phone will be repaired or replaced by another one"..
today 5 months further .. more than 50-60 emails.. phone calls etc.. 
they not able to find a solution.. the emails seems are automatic responses.. and lie about everything.

Google support team stop lie to your customers.. if you can't do your job correctly .. just don't do it.

google is just Waste of time and energy... never again.
